title: Swann in Love = Un Amour de Swann
creator_credit: Volker Schlondorff, Nicole Stephane, Eberhard Junkersdorf, Margaret Menegoz, Les Films du Losange, Bioskop Film and Gaumont-British Instructional
brief_description: Based on one of Marcel Proust’s stories from “Remembrance of things past”, the film tells the story of Charles Swann’s obsessively jealous passion for the socially unsuitable Odette de Crecy. Stars Jeremy Irons, Alain Delon and Ornella Muti.
